caption.p: Mean (±SE) degree centrality of authors who are members of the MACSUR knowledge hub ( squares) compared with remaining authors in the network ( crosses). Mean degree centrality is significantly higher for MACSUR members ( F 1,10332 = 457.1, p < 0.001) and significantly different between time periods for MACSUR members ( F 1,10332 = 457.1, p < 0.001)
